content.text: Hello Lea, I came to visit you but couldn't find you at home. I brought you chamomile tea, since I know you've been having these stomachaches, you should drink a cup after every meal. I also left you some tila,  you shoud also make it in a tea and have a cup before going to bed. Darling, I also know that you are tired most of the time during the day, you shouldn't stay up that late looking at your cellphone. Instead, you should grab a book and read for 15 to 20 min every night and then try to sleep. I hope you follow these recomendations, I want you to feel better my love, you should come visit me soon and I will make you the apple pie you love so much. Send you lots of kisses darling.
